theorem ae_cover_Ico [NoMaxOrder α] : ae_cover μ l fun i => Ico (a i) (b i) :=
  { ae_eventually_mem :=
      ae_of_all μ fun x =>
        (ha.eventually <| eventually_le_atBot x).mp <|
          (hb.eventually <| eventually_gt_atTop x).mono fun i hbi hai => ⟨hai, hbi⟩
    measurable := fun i => measurable_set_Ico }
#align ae_cover_Ico ae_cover_Ico

  { ae_eventually_mem := ae_of_all μ fun x => (ha.eventually <| eventually_le_atBot x).mono fun i hai => hai
    measurable := fun i => measurable_set_Ici }
